Articles.Content: Im not quite sure if it's just me, but ever since the update my game's gone to a crawl. Just when designing a rocket in the VAB its extremely choppy and during flight, Any suggestions?

Updating your drivers is always a good step to take.  My framerates have been just fine. In fact almost too smooth, as I have to actually allow for that with my controls. I am used to the game running rougher for me.

I can honestly I have had no problems since moving to 1.1 but so far I have only built and a handful of rockets, munar flyby being the furthest I have been (so far).

Edited April 23, 2016 by ag3nt108
Lol just updated drivers and it fixed everything
